website_summaries.verdict: For those watching their calories, having a peanut butter powder option with no added sugar is helpful.
pros: Very simple formula that  delivers a good taste, even without the extra sugar
Far fewer calories and significantly lower fat content versus traditional peanut butter
Good consistency to use inside recipes and protein shakes
cons: Jar of this product is only 13 ounces, so it's smaller than others

customer_reviews.title: Farts. Terrible farts
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes so good and has fewer calories than regular peanut butter and goes great in my smoothies. But the farts.... Just nothing good about that part. Makes me so sad to have to give this up
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: PASS - Get the Regular Version
customer_reviews.text: OVERVIEW I got this just to try it. I am a long time consumer of the regular versions (both peanut and chocolate). Compared the regular version there really is not all that much difference in calories or carbs. PROS: ► Does not taste terrible CONS: ► Does not taste as good as the original version ► It is almost twice as expensive as the regular version ► Does NOT have a significantly less number of calories than the regular version ► Does NOT have as good of consistency when mixed (it is more watery) RECOMMENDATION: Skip this low carb version and go with the regular version
customer_reviews.author: Bryon Gaskin

customer_reviews.title: Tastes a little different than original
customer_reviews.text: The sugar free pb fit still tastes okay but not as good as the original. I like the lower calories and higher protein a lot but because it’s a bit more expensive, I’ll go back to the original for now.
customer_reviews.author: Niccie

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a sugar free version of powered peanut butter.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why every powered peanut butter at my local stores have to include sugar. I am glad that they have this sugar free version available. It tastes great and mixes into shakes well. I use it about 3x per week.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: Keto friendly!
customer_reviews.text: On keto, and wanted something to add to my shakes. This is PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Gaertner

customer_reviews.title: Low carbs,sweeten with splenda! love,love,love!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delicious! Mix 1/4 cup of water mix with 2 caps of powder. Add almond milk, stir hard.
customer_reviews.author: tatiana Kazem

customer_reviews.title: yummy
customer_reviews.text: Made Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookie Cake with this powder, came out much better than with a natural peanut butter. my baked good still came out moist but, has more of cakey texture now which is what i wanted.. Did try this powder mixed as a peanut butter spread based on directions stated on jar, it ended up needing more water for a more creamy version and i added a drop of liquid sweetener to sweeten it up. it was yummy as a dip!! after monthssss of hearing about this product, am glad i finally decided to buy it and will continue to do so for sure for it is great for making keto/low carb goods.
customer_reviews.author: Casper & BooTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Obsessed.
customer_reviews.text: Oh man. I wish I would’ve discovered this stuff sooner. Complete game changer. Here’s a little tip: add one tsp of powder to 1/4 avocado and BAM! - peanut butter! You can’t even taste the avocado! Try it. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Marie

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I have recently been made aware that a lot of stuff I put in my body is not good. A friend recommended this to me after he was told the same thing by his doctor. I gotta say, this stuff ain't bad. I have been using for a couple of months. I played with the instructions to get it the way I like it, and now my regular peanut butter isn't. I have recommended it to a couple friends... So, I recommend it to you.
customer_reviews.author: Real customer

customer_reviews.title: over priced
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to flavor overnight refrigerator oats. I thought it added good flavor and I was a happy camper until I came across the original version packaged in a 30oz container at almost the same price I paid for this 13oz container. That suddenly put a bad taste in my mouth. So if you are interested in this product, shop around, you can do better. The "sugar free" marking on the label is misleading. A more accurate description would be "reduced sugar" as it does contain sugar alcohol, not a problem for everyone but a problem for some.
customer_reviews.author: experimenter

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Havn't used the original or any other powdered peanut butter as I only recently started focusing on including a higher ratio of protein into my diet but it tastes good-I like to add it to oatmeal for some extra proteinand I like how it dosn't include added sugar and actually has a decent form of sugar subsitute. I avoid added sugars unless it's a special occasion so this works for my daily routine. ;)
customer_reviews.author: ZOBO

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in baking, but I tried it as a spread just to see what it was like. Well, I have almost finished the container and have to order more, and I have not baked anything yet - still enjoying it as a spread. It is great! My biggest problem is not eating the spread by the spoonful and finishing it in one sitting. I am trying to exercise some self-control...Still working on it.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Keto delight!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! My favorite way to use it is to mix some with either bone broth or water and make a peanut sauce to top my shirataki noodles with! Mmmm so good! Will be using in protein shakes too.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa’s Vanity

customer_reviews.title: Great for Keto
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this stuff ever since it came out. You just add a little water and bam peanut butter without the fat. Super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Launlori

customer_reviews.title: The BEST brand of powdered peanut butter!
customer_reviews.text: Love all of this brands products. Hubby's glucose was high so trying to cut back on the sugar and I'm doing a points program to shed a little weight. Decided to go with the sugar free this time instead of my regular PB2. Only complaint is that this was shipped with an order of instant coffee and there was no packing in the oversized box. The items were flung around the entire trip here. Fortunately, neither broke open and created a powder plume.
customer_reviews.author: kfritter

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, but way smaller jar than the regular powder
customer_reviews.text: This tastes as good as the regular powder they sell, but the jar is way smaller. I didn't notice that. I have been using the other version for a long time and frankly there isn't much sugar in that at all. On top of that, this is not organic. I'm going back to the original which is a much better value, and organic.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynnTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved peanut butter but being on WW this powdered alternative has been GREAT. easy to use and the taste if good; not as good as regular peanut butter, but none of the fat makes this a wonderful alternative. I've found numerous uses for it and enjoy it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Janice L

customer_reviews.title: It's surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I gave the taste 3.5 stars. It's not afterall fresh ground peanut butter from wholefoods. However, for what it is, it is surprisingly good. It is super great for peanut butter sauces. We made a great sweet potato stew with it. It is less good spread on toast but passable.
customer_reviews.author: Rdinws

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: saw this and bought to save money doesnt taste as well as pb2
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protein powder for smoothies, if you like peanut butter.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that peanut powder with most of the fat pressed out could come close to real peanut butter taste in my smoothies, but tried the plain (sugar-free) variety, and it is really good. Not the same as peanut butter, but still a nice peanut butter flavor, plus a fraction of the fat and calories. Not sure what the reviewers who are complaining about lack of flavor are talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good mix
customer_reviews.text: It surprises me how many calories and how much sugar is in some peanut butters. I also do not like the flavor of the 0 calorie peanut butter spread I have tried. I add PB fit to the 0 calorie to keep the calories and sugar low and I enjoy it especially knowing it is healthy.
customer_reviews.author: DRJUDY

customer_reviews.title: Monk Fruit sweetened, so awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than the Naked PB I ordered. The flavor is better and I love that they sweetened it in a responsible way with Monk fruit which is beneficial to health vs. stevia.
customer_reviews.author: Americankiwi

customer_reviews.title: Regular PB Fit is way better
customer_reviews.text: We tried to reduce the calories, but the taste, cost and only 10 calories less is a rip-off! We use the regular PB fit several times a day in shakes and meals and it is fabulous. A game changer, but this stuff is too costly and not as good. And only 10 calories saved. Don't waste your time on making this stuff. Keep doing what you were already doing well! Thanks PB Fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tony A

customer_reviews.title: YUM!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased because I wanted to give Keto a try. This exceeded all my expectations! Great flavor, easy to use and little goes a long way. Definitely worth every penny! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Levesque

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Really good! I've been on a calorie restricted diet so peanut butter has been off my menu for a long time. This product is great. Super low calorie compared to regular peanut butter. Easy to prepare, spreads nice, tastes great. I use it for everything traditional peanut butter would be used.
customer_reviews.author: ReindeerGames

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, without the sugar :)
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE peanut butter, and this allows for the same consistency and taste, without as much "peanuts" or peanut oil. Pro tip: mix with [grassfed butter] and honey (add dark chocolate chips if you're me) and put in the fridge or freezer for @ 30-60 minutes. You're welcome!
customer_reviews.author: The_Kim_Kelley

customer_reviews.title: This makes the most spreadable peanut butter ever!
customer_reviews.text: We eat peanut butter on our breakfast toast, and this is the most spreadable peanut butter ever. Easy to mix up. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: gpdooby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff so much. The peanut butter flavor is so rich and fantastic. This is a great way to still enjoy the wonderful flavor of peanut butter without all of the calories. It works well in recipes as well. Highly recommend and will definitely be purchasing on repeat!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Petersen

customer_reviews.title: sweet, convenient
customer_reviews.text: This product is quite sweet, so you don't need jelly for your pb&j sandwich. Sugar-free, and de-fatted, so low in calories. I'd say it's a diet product, though, and isn't very filling if you're looking for a dense food for backpacking or emergency rations.
customer_reviews.author: A. H. Claus

customer_reviews.title: high in salt and sugar alcohol!
customer_reviews.text: my fault for not reading the label. i thought this was pure peanut powder. its very high in sodium and bloat inducing sugar alcohol. will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Country Lawyer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical about powdered peanut butter, but this was suggested in a Keto recipe I wanted to make. Because it is sugar free and easy to use, I decided to give it a try. I am happy I did,,,, the flavor is amazing, and it is so easy to use in recipes to make anything with peanut butter flavor. It also did not give me the bloat feeling I usually get with regular peanut butter. I even tried it as regular peanut butter on celery and the taste was still great. It is easy to mix up with a little water to whatever consistency you like.
customer_reviews.author: Rhinestonediva

customer_reviews.title: Delicious way to add protein
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to add to smoothies. I used the PB powder with blueberries, almond milk and stevia. It tasted delicious. I ordered the PB for a second time!
customer_reviews.author: smokingsky

customer_reviews.title: GREAT low-fat substitute for peanut butter.
customer_reviews.text: Also great for travel, but I mainly use it b/c I love p.b., but don't want to consume all the fat.
customer_reviews.author: Lkimba75

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this product is kinda expensive just for peanut butter but I sure do love it. So much that i would buy it again nevermind the price. Theres way less calories and less sugar. It's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Brand/Britt

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the sugar free.
customer_reviews.text: Mix it in my MiM to add flavor and protein. The powder is easy to use, can mix with water for a peanut butter with all the flavor but less fat. Does mix in drinks but not easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Mills

customer_reviews.title: It has an amazing taste
customer_reviews.text: I got it out of curiousity because it was in discount and I actually really liked the taste, it is not sugary and it blends very well with milk. Surpassed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished my first bottle and will definitely be ordering another! I’m going to a nutritionist right now and the 1 thing I really missed being able to have was peanut butter! So happy I found this healthy substitute that gives me all of the flavor I missed. I mix it in my smoothies, baked oatmeal cups, and even just have it with apples. The bottle tells you to mix it with water but I prefer mixing it with almond milk. I even got my mom switch over to it! I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Delsid

customer_reviews.title: No One Told Me
customer_reviews.text: How did I not know that this existed?!?! I would have been sucking this thru a straw years ago! (yes, it's a powder) I've added to recipes, mixed with cream cheese, tossed into smoothies. Oh yum.
customer_reviews.author: Biana

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor, does not taste off or like it has artificial sweetener.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha J

customer_reviews.title: Not something I’ll buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after a friend told me about powdered peanut butter working better in her shakes. So i ordered this sugar free one for the lower calories. It doesn’t taste like peanut butter at all to me. I’ve used several spoon fulls and still can’t taste it. Not sure if it’s this brand or that is sugar free. Could just be powered peanut butter isn’t the same as regular.
customer_reviews.author: anc6433

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my morning Carnation Instant Breakfast for special flavor. Doesn't add any additional sugar to my drink. This is a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: M  Jo

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! Healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a healthy snack! I mix this with yogurt and it makes the best peanut butter snack. Tastes excellent and is very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Nurseontherun

customer_reviews.title: Where you want the flavor but not the calories
customer_reviews.text: I have a recipe for a dip for fruit and veges that uses powdered peanut butter. It suits my diet, contains needed protein, and is very tastey.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great for my shake
customer_reviews.text: Awesome taste! I use a tablespoon in my chocolate protein shake with crushed ice and Unsweetened Vanilla almond milk! Delicious 😋
customer_reviews.author: Lorinda Rangel #1 Dallas Cowboy Fan

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Healthy alternative to regular peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I love this peanut butter! I have used it in smoothies for a few months now, pancakes. Baking, oatmeal, etc. so good and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best PB powder product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I add a teaspoon to my smoothie and it tastes great. Will definitely order again. I’ve used several brands and this is, by far, the best!

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Flavor surprised me, it is great! Like low calorie/sugar, because I like spreading a LOT on my sandwich!! Definitely order again!!

customer_reviews.title: Easy but not enough flavor
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use for smoothies, no weird flavor but just not enough flavor. I went back to using normal sugar free peanut butters

customer_reviews.title: I keep buying it so it is good.
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my MTN OPS protein shakes. Between both products everything is keto and tastes amazing. The ultimate weight loss and fitness food.

customer_reviews.title: Smoothie Savior
customer_reviews.text: DELICIOUS. Just buy it if you like peanut butter. I make a chocolate banana peanut butter smoothie you would pay ten bucks for.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this brand before, but I have never seen the All-Natural version in stores so I thought I'd give it a try. It is a little sweet, but it's not overwhelming. I typically add this to my morning smoothie/protein shakes. It helps with the thickness and would definitely try again !

customer_reviews.title: Delicious.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a Vanilla Protien Shake for lunch. I don't use a whole tablespoon. It's so Peanutbuttery.

customer_reviews.title: delicious
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this has escaped me thus far. I'm very particular about my calorie and sugar intake but definitely love peanut butter. This solves both. Also great to bake with!

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sugar-free PB fit. Decent flavor and mixes well into Greek yogurt and my protein shakes.

customer_reviews.title: Made me feel sick

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement for Smoothies!

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and more protein!
customer_reviews.text: I like this powder, it adds a little extra PB flavor and protein to my smoothies, but I still add actual PB.

customer_reviews.title: Chunks of peanut butter powder.

customer_reviews.title: Wal-Mart has it for less, I highly recommend getting this stuff

Although I will say I add a pinch of salt when I eat it as peanut butter because I like mine a little saltier. Other than that it's perfect. My toddler loves it too, and I can make it a little less thick for her so it's not a choking hazard.

If the "sugar" content were cut to half, then it might be better tasting. Sorry, but not to my liking.

customer_reviews.title: I use this as a less fat alternative to regular peanut butter

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Love mixing it with my chocolate protein powder for a boost of extra protein.

customer_reviews.text: This peanut butter powder is great. I mix 2 tsp in my protein shake every day. Definitely will buy regularly. Love it!

product_meta.title: PBfit All-Natural Peanut Butter Powder, Sugar-Free Powdered Peanut Spread from Real Roasted Pressed Peanuts, 8g of Protein (13 oz.)
feature_bullets: SAME GREAT TASTE: Introducing PBfit that is sugar-free! Now, you can get the great benefits of PBfit with no added sugar! We use a naturally sweet monk fruit blend to give PBfit Sugar-Free a similar flavor to PBfit Original.
SIMPLE INGREDIENTS: PBfit Sugar-Free is made with 3 simple ingredients: peanut flour, monk fruit blend (erythritol and monk fruit extract), and salt. Did we mention it's all-natural and gluten-free?

DELICIOUSNESS DEFINED: For a delicious, reduced-fat peanut butter spread, mix 2 tbsp. of dry PBfit Sugar-Free with 1.5 tbsp. water. Stir until smooth, and spread anywhere you would put regular peanut butter!

PROTEIN POWER: With 8g of protein in one serving of PBfit Sugar-Free, you can get a boost of protein right after your workout at the gym. Try adding it to the protein powder you already use or add it in your morning smoothie for a delicious protein boost. Great for men and women.

BLEND, BAKE, OR SHAKE: When it comes to the uses for PBfit, the possibilities are endless! Mix into baked goods like bread, pancakes, waffles, and cookies to add a great peanut butter flavor. You can also blend it into breakfast smoothies and other drinks for a tasty, low-fat protein boost after the gym! Great for men and women!
